item.description:
SEE THE PHOTO ALBUM POSTED HERE ON 9/20/10

Historic Architecture of Manchester Tour
Sunday, October 3, 2010
Noon-5:00 p.m.
$20 in advance, $25 day of tour (MHA members receive a $5 discount)
Your ticket allows admission to all properties (you choose which ones you will see, and in which order), plus admission to the Millyard Museum and the SEE Science Center.

Call the Millyard Museum at (603) 622-7531 to purchase tickets.

The Manchester Historic Association will showcase architectural masterpieces during this popular special event. This yearâ€™s tour will include the newly rehabilitated Pandora Mill as well as the Amoskeag Millyard Apartments which were originally used as housing for the mill workers. The other tour sites are the historic Ash Street School, the Mary Gale Apartments, the Foy Insurance building (1889 Elm Street) and Twin Towers Condominiums (a converted shoe factory).
item.name: Historic Architecture of Manchester Tour
